result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel J. Fraunfelder was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine [Modifiers: Repeater], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Clerk: Kimberly
Case called: 1:34pm
INCLUDES: 11CM1155, 12CF750, 13CF35, 13CF346, 13CF348, 15CF649
State appears by ADA Michael Puerner; Deft appears in person, in custody, with Atty Lou Ann Bohn

State is here for SAR on 11CM1155, 12CF750, 13CF35, 13CF346, 13CF348 & plea in 15CF649

Initial appearance & plea in 15CF649:
Information to be filed. Reading wavied
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW in all 6 cases.
PLEA: 
Ct. 1 Possession of Methamphetamine - repeater >> NO CONTEST
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: 3 years WSPS: 1 year IC, 2 years ES, consecutive to other sentences. 78 days credit.

SAR:
11CM1155: Ct. 1 Violate a Domestic Abuse Injuction-repeater-domestic abuse- 2 years WSPS: 1 year IC, 1 year ES. 407 days credit
12CF750: Ct. 2 DC-DA repeater-use of dangerous weapon- 2 yrs. 9 months WSPS: 1 year 9 months IC, 1 year ES, Ct. 3 Criminal Damage to property-DA repeater-DA- 2 yrs 9 months WSPS: 1 year 9 months IC, 1 year ES, and Ct. 4 BJ-Misdemeanor- 9 months MCJ, 651 days credit
13CF35: Ct. 1 BJ-Felony- 6 years WSPS: 3 years IC, 3 years ES. 407 days credit
13CF346: Ct. 1 BJ-Felony- 6 years WSPS: 3 years IC, 3 years ES. 407 days credit
13CF348: Ct. 2 DC-DA repeater-DA- 2 years WSPS: 1 year IC, 1 year ES. 407 days credit
>> All above 5 cases to run concurrent to one another and concurrent to 13CF819 

COURT ORDERS for all 6 cases: Total 9 years WSPS- 4 years IC, 5 years ES. CONDITIONS of ES: No contact with T.F. and D.W. , expect for purposes of child exchange and comunication of child exchange or if allowed by agent. Complete SAFE program or equivalant programming. Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol. Complete AODA assessment with follow through, unless done through substance abuse program through prison. Random UA's or other testing. Eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program and Substance Abuse Program. Pay court costs, any outstanding fees to be paid as term of ES. Pay DNA sample and surcharge.
